name: rumply
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
creased (= not smooth) or untidy: He was dressed in a rumply turtleneck and rumply black jeans. His hair was sort of rumply and flying around, not tidy like yours.
More examplesFewer examplesThe material expands as it grows and is forced to wrinkle like a rumply rug.The faster it grows, the rumplier its surface becomes.The bed was rumply and uncomfortable.The house was just a wooden box with a rumply tin roof on top.
